EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Information (1322868014.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Richard,
Thank you for notifying me. Please let me know if you have any questions moving forward and I would appreciate any referrals that you send to us!
Have a great holiday if I dont speak with you before then and a happy new year!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Richard E. Ziegler [mailto:RZiegler@APGsolutions.org] Sent: Wednesday, November 30, 2011 10:30 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Bronwyn Ziegler Subject: Re: MBO Information
Hi Nicolette-I am going to hold off going forward with MBO Partners at this time since I have lean back office systems that require very little time since reorganizing this past summer . However, it may make sense for me to revisit this decision in May 2012.
Thanks for all your work informing me of the features and benefits of MBO. I will try to send you referrals as I come across independent consultants and contractors. Richard
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Wednesday, November 16, 2011 3:34 PM To: Richard E. Ziegler Subject: RE: MBO Information
Great! I look forward to speaking with you.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Richard E. Ziegler [mailto:RZiegler@APGsolutions.org] Sent: Wednesday, November 16, 2011 3:06 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information
Got it. 10 am Friday works fine. Richard
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Wednesday, November 16, 2011 12:24 PM To: Richard E. Ziegler Subject: RE: MBO Information
Hi Richard,
I checked the schedule and Friday morning is available at 10:0am would that work for you? I have sent you an invitation for this, please approve if it works and if not we can work on scheduling a different time.
Thank you and have a great day! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: Richard E. Ziegler [mailto:RZiegler@APGsolutions.org] Sent: Saturday, November 12, 2011 4:01 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Bronwyn Ziegler Subject: Re: MBO Information
Hi Nicolette-Thanks for your follow-up. Tuesday anytime or this coming Friday morning work best for me. What openings to you have for the GoToMeeting session? Richard
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Wednesday, November 09, 2011 12:29 PM To: Richard E. Ziegler Subject: RE: MBO Information
Hi Richard,
I hope all is well! I wanted to follow up with you from our initial conversation to see if you had any additional questions for me. I know you had interest in seeing a demo of our site so I would like to set up a time for us to speak so I could set up a go-to meeting with you to show you some of the system functionalities of the system.
I also know you expressed interest in speaking with one of our current associates and there is actually a section on our website with testimonials and actual interview recordings of some of our Associates whom volunteered to speak with our marketing team about their experience with MBO. The link to that portion of our site is below:
http://www.mbopartners.com/#successstories
Please let me know when a good time to follow up with you will be by phone. In order to schedule the Go To Meeting I will need at least a few days advance notice to make sure the time slot is available (we share 2 licenses with the whole office and a lot of people use this for their conference calls), so sometime next week would be best.
I look forward to speaking with you again soon!
Thank you,
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Richard E. Ziegler [mailto:RZiegler@APGsolutions.org] Sent: Wednesday, October 12, 2011 11:00 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information
Got it. I will probably be back to you early next week. Richard
From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Tuesday, October 11, 2011 12:21 PM To: Richard E. Ziegler Subject: MBO Information
Hi Richard,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today! Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. Ive included a few items as promised regarding the MBO Program:
Link to our true group benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits Link to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf · Link to our Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf
Link to a video about How We Help Independent Consultants:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1
Using MBO Partners versus working on a 1099 basis:http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_vs_1099_Comparison.pdf
Also, below are a few articles just for you to read at your leisure:
http://www.channelinsider.com/c/a/Spotlight/Top-Mistakes-New-IT-Consultants-Make-And-How-to-Avoid-Making-Them-Yourself-180466/
http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/Landmark-National-Study-Reveals-Millions-Join-New-Age-Career-Independence-Surprising-1557357.htm
If you have any additional questions for me feel free to schedule a convenient time using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you again soon!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
